title: That Fool Is Dead
body:
That Fool Is Dead

"When will more students will come here?" Evan muttered while sitting on a branch of a thick tree.

It is been around twenty minutes since he opened the golden chest.

After he eliminated Annie and her team no one else come to the top of the mountain.

1.--// Evan And Mike - 9688//--

2. --// Valery And Fin - 7943 //--

3.--// Leon And Sally - 7828 //--

4.--// Amy And Gloria - 6180 //--

Evan looked at the rankings and his eyes can't help but twitch.

"Are these bastards fighting alone without inviting me?" Evan said and thought about going down the mountain to look for other students.

"Hmm," suddenly Evan received a message and a surprised expression appeared on his face.

(Your teammate Mike is eliminated)

"That fool is dead," Evan said while looking at the message with an amused look on his face.

But his expression turned dark when he looked at the rankings once again.

1.--// Evan - 9280//--
